message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique item that I believe would greatly enhance your life or business. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. However, I understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person. Based on my assessment, I believe this product is worth $120 to you, considering its benefits and how it aligns with your needs. Would you be interested in purchasing it at this price?
